author: Reuters
title: Afghan president Ghani says he left country in order to avoid bloodshed - Reuters
description: Afghan President Ashraf Ghani said on Sunday he left the country in order to avoid bloodshed, as the Taliban entered the presidential palace in Kabul.
content: Afghanistan's President Ashraf Ghani speaks during a news conference in Kabul, Afghanistan December 7, 2015. Ghani confirmed on Monday that he would travel to Pakistan for a regional conference on Af… [+659 chars]
source.name: Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Albania ready to temporarily house Afghan refugees, PM Rama says - Reuters
description: Albania has accepted a U.S. request to temporarily take in Afghan refugees seeking visas to enter the United States, Prime Minister Edi Rama said on Sunday, as Taliban forces entered the Afghan capital Kabul.
content: Albanian Prime Minister and leader of the Socialist Party Edi Rama speaks at a rally celebrating the party's election victory, at Skanderbeg Square in Tirana, Albania April 27, 2021. REUTERS/Florion … [+1401 chars]
source.name: Reuters

author: Michael Goff
title: Taliban return to power as president and diplomats flee Kabul
description: Published by Reuters KABUL (Reuters) -Taliban insurgents were returning to power in Kabul on Monday after a military advance across Afghanistan as U.S-led forces departed, and Western nations stepped up efforts to evacuate their citizens from the capital. Pre…
